mapper.select: SELECT line_no, sku_code, sku_name, plan_qty, scan_qty, surplus_qty, um_name, detail_status, sku_spec, remark, sku_lot1, sku_lot4, sku_lot5, sku_lot6, sku_lot8 from receive_detail where receive_id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
select receive_detail_id, scan_qty from receive_detail where receive_id = #{id}
select receive_detail_id, sku_id, plan_qty, um_code, sku_spec, remark from receive_detail where receive_id = #{id}
select line_no from receive_detail where receive_id = #{receiveId} order by create_time desc limit 1

SELECT rd.receive_detail_id, rd.line_no, rd.sku_code, rd.surplus_qty, rd.um_code, rd.sku_lot1, ws.sku_spec skulot2, rd.sku_lot4, rd.sku_lot5, rd.sku_lot6, rd.sku_lot8 FROM receive_detail rd, wms_sku ws WHERE rd.sku_code = ws.sku_code and line_no = #{query.lineNumber} and receive_id = #{query.receiveId} and detail_status in ('10', '20')
